thread.title: RAMpage Live 25: CSU football on the brink of greatness
thread.title_full: RAMpage Live 25: CSU football on the brink of greatness

title: RAMpage Live 25: CSU football on the brink of greatness
text:
RAMpage Live 25: CSU football on the brink of greatness Matt L. Stephens , matthewstephens@coloradoan.com 9:52 a.m. MDT October 7, 2015 Matt Stephens, Kelly Lyell and Joel Dreessen discuss whether the Colorado State football program can rise to power in the same way Boise State has. Matt L. Stephens Former CSU and NFL tight end Joel Dreessen guest starred on RAMpage Live this week. (Photo: Ed Mulholland/USA TODAY Sports) 10 CONNECT 3 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Former Colorado State football star and NFL tight end Joel Dreessen, who most recently played with the Denver Broncos, joined the Coloradoan crew for RAMpage Live, our weekly CSU football show, on Tuesday in front of a packed house at The Boot Grill in Fort Collins. 
Dreessen, who now hosts a radio and TV show in Denver, feels like the Rams are on the brink of greatness if they can start cleaning up their mental on-field mistakes, such as penalties at the most inopportune times. CSU hosts No. 25 Boise State this week at 5 p.m. Saturday. 
Listen to the entire episode by clicking the embed below or subscribe and download RAMpage Live for free on iTunes or by using the Podcasts app on your iOS device. Video highlights from the episode will be posted throughout the week, including the one above looking at what CSU needs to do to sustain success like Boise State has. Read or Share this story: http://noconow.co/1RtQNcI TOP VIDEOS
